data.author: James E. Casey
data.quote: One measure of your success will be the degree to which you build up others who work with you. While building up others, you will build up yourself.

data.author: Bill Owens
data.quote: True leadership lies in guiding others to success. In ensuring that everyone is performing at their best, doing the work they are pledged to do and doing it well.

data.author: Jack Welch
data.quote: You've got to eat while you dream. You've got to deliver on short-range commitments, while you develop a long-range strategy and vision and implement it. The success of doing both. Walking and chewing gum if you will. Getting it done in the short-range, and delivering a long-range plan, and executing on that.

data.author: Larry King
data.quote: Those who have succeeded at anything and don't mention luck are kidding themselves.

data.author: Lil Wayne
data.quote: I'm an addict, I'm addicted to success. Thankfully, there's no rehab for success.

data.author: Ellen Ochoa
data.quote: We are constantly emphasizing to people that they need to address anything that affects flight safety or mission success - many pathways to do that. We need to understand better what may be preventing people from using those pathways.

data.author: Henry Ward Beecher
data.quote: It is not the going out of port, but the coming in, that determines the success of a voyage.

data.author: Jessica Savitch
data.quote: I worked half my life to be an overnight success, and still it took me by surprise.

data.author: Henry Rollins
data.quote: I believe that one defines oneself by reinvention. To not be like your parents. To not be like your friends. To be yourself. To cut yourself out of stone.

data.author: Nelson Mandela
data.quote: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.

data.author: Henry Drummond
data.quote: The people who influence you are the people who believe in you.

data.author: Cardinal Richelieu
data.quote: Carry on any enterprise as if all future success depended on it.

data.author: Edward Young
data.quote: Too low they build, who build beneath the stars.

data.author: Alia Bhatt
data.quote: I think the success that I have is due to hard work and destiny. It is important to stay grounded and not take things for granted.

data.author: Marilyn Monroe
data.quote: Success makes so many people hate you. I wish it wasn't that way. It would be wonderful to enjoy success without seeing envy in the eyes of those around you.

data.author: Ben Sweetland
data.quote: Success is a journey, not a destination.

data.author: Cheryl Crawford
data.quote: Lee's great gifts are teaching and inspirational guidance, not administration and management.

data.author: Dale Carnegie
data.quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.

data.author: Dale Turner
data.quote: Some of the best lessons we ever learn are learned from past mistakes. The error of the past is the wisdom and success of the future.

data.author: Johnny Depp
data.quote: You grow up a bit damaged or broken then you have some success but you don't know how to feel good about the work you're doing or the life you're leading.
